title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files do not appear in the File menu MRU (Most Recently Used) list. The list should persist between different workbench sessions.
EB: The MRU file list should display the recently opened files even after the workbench is shut down and restarted.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Start the workbench. 
2. Open 2 or 3 files. 
3. Shut down the workbench. 
4. Restart the workbench.
